snippet: While some of the N.F.L.'s most explosive offenses will be on display this weekend, so will its top defense.
abstract: While some of the N.F.L.'s most explosive offenses will be on display this weekend, so will its top defense.
lead_paragraph: Lions (10-6) at Saints (13-3)Saturday, 8 p.m.Line: Saints by 10.5

headline.main: Playoff Matchups: A Lot of Offense, a Little Defense
